typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	P_BATCH_NBR as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		Variables as string,
		Answer_KEY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNtfUNPOVITE
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECT
source(output(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE
source(output(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_ES as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_FR as string,
		ISO2_CODE as string,
		ISO3_CODE as string,
		LEAST_DEVELPED_COUNTRY as string,
		LAND_LCKD_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		SMALL_ISLAND_DEVELOPING_STATES as string,
		DEVELOPED_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCOUNTRY
source(output(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSURVEYDETAILS
source(output(
		DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_TIME as date,
		DAY_OF_MONTH as integer,
		CALENDER_MONTH_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_MONTH_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_YEAR as integer,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_MONTH_ID as integer,
		FISCAL_MONTH_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_ID as integer,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_ID as integer,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSURVEYDATE
source(output(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY as integer,
		VARIABLE_NAME as string,
		SURVEY_QUESTIONIRE_VERSION_NO as string,
		QUENTION_TITLE as string,
		VARIABLE_DESC as string,
		RESPONSE_TYPE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLE
source(output(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_OPTION_SR_KEY as integer,
		VARIABLE_NAME as string,
		SURVEY_QUESTIONIRE_VERSION_NO as string,
		QUENTION_TITLE as string,
		OPTIONS_CODE as string,
		OPTIONS_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITY01
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITY02
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE as integer,
		CHANGE_VALUE as integer,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FACTENTITYSURVEY01
Select1, DIMPROJECT1 lookup(upper(trim(ProjectID)) == upper(trim(PROJECT_ID)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpPROJECT
LkpPROJECT, DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE1 lookup(upper(trim(Context)) == upper(trim(CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCONTEXT
LkpCONTEXT, DIMCOUNTRY1 lookup(upper(trim(Country)) == upper(trim(COUNTRY_NAME_EN)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCOUNTRY
LkpCOUNTRY, DIMSURVEYDETAILS1 lookup(iifNull(Select1@INTERVIEWEE_NAME, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_NAME,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@INTERVIERWER_NAME, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIERWER_NAME,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@INTERVIEWEE_POSITION, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@SUPERVISOR_NAME, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@SUPERVISOR_NAME,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED)
	&& iifNull(Select1@TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,'')
	&& iifNull(Select1@INTERVIEW_DURATION, '') == iifNull(DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEW_DURATION,'')
	&& iifNull(interviewkey,'') == iifNull(INTERVIEW_KEY,'')
	&& iifNull(interviewid,'') == iifNull(INTERVIEW_ID,''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYDETAILS
SrcNtfUNPOVITE select(mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		Context,
		FirmID,
		{Date of data collection},
		Country,
		interviewkey,
		interviewid,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = A01,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = A02,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = A03,
		ENTITY_NAME = A04,
		A06,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = A07,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = A09,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = A10,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = A11,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = A12,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		Variables,
		Answer_KEY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
LkpSURVEYDETAILS, DIMSURVEYDATE1 lookup(toDate({Date of data collection}, 'MM/DD/YYYY') == DATE_TIME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYDATE
LkpSURVEYDATE, DIMSURVEYVARIABLE1 lookup(Variables == VARIABLE_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYVARIABLE
LkpSURVEYVARIABLE, DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1 lookup(Variables == DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1@VARIABLE_NAME
	&& Answer_KEY == OPTIONS_CODE
	&& RESPONSE_TYPE == 'SELECTION',
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION
DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMPROJECT1
DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE select(mapColumn(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE1
DIMCOUNTRY select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_CODE,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMCOUNTRY1
DIMSURVEYDETAILS select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDETAILS1
DIMSURVEYDATE select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDATE1
DIMSURVEYVARIABLE select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY,
		VARIABLE_NAME,
		RESPONSE_TYPE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLE1
DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION select(mapColumn(
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY = SURVEY_VARIABLE_OPTION_SR_KEY,
		VARIABLE_NAME,
		OPTIONS_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1
Select2 derive(BATCH_ID = toInteger($P_BATCH_NBR),
		SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE = iif(RESPONSE_TYPE=='DATA INPUT', Answer_KEY, ''),
		CHANGE_VALUE = iif(RESPONSE_TYPE=='DATA INPUT',
    toInteger(Answer_KEY)-toInteger(FACT_SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE),
    toInteger(null())
   )

 ,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
LkpCHANGEVALUE, DIMENTITY01Select lookup(Select1@ENTITY_NAME == DIMENTITY01Select@ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpENTITY
DIMENTITY01, LatestVersionENTITY join(DIMENTITY01@ENTITY_ID == LatestVersionENTITY@ENTITY_ID
	&& DIMENTITY01@VERSION_NO == LatestVersionENTITY@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
DIMENTITY02 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestVersionENTITY
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY01Select
LkpENTITY select(mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		Context,
		FirmID,
		{Date of data collection},
		Country,
		interviewkey,
		interviewid,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = Select1@INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = Select1@INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = Select1@TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		A04 = Select1@ENTITY_NAME,
		A06,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = Select1@SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = Select1@INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = Select1@TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = Select1@INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = Select1@INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = Select1@INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		Variables,
		Answer_KEY,
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_CODE,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN,
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = DIMSURVEYDETAILS1@INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY,
		VARIABLE_NAME = DIMSURVEYVARIABLE1@VARIABLE_NAME,
		RESPONSE_TYPE,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY,
		VARIABLE_NAME = DIMSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION1@VARIABLE_NAME,
		OPTIONS_CODE,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		FACT_SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
FilterRESPONSEDataInput aggregate(groupBy(PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY),
	SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY = max(SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY)) ~> LastServeyRESPONSE
FACTENTITYSURVEY01 filter(not(isNull(SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE))) ~> FilterRESPONSEDataInput
FACTENTITYSURVEY01, LastServeyRESPONSE join(FACTENTITYSURVEY01@PROJECT_SR_KEY == LastServeyRESPONSE@PROJECT_SR_KEY
	&& FACTENTITYSURVEY01@SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY == LastServeyRESPONSE@SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY
	&& FACTENTITYSURVEY01@SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY == LastServeyRESPONSE@SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		FACT_PROJECT_SR_KEY = FACTENTITYSURVEY01@PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		FACT_SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY = FACTENTITYSURVEY01@SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY,
		FACT_SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY = FACTENTITYSURVEY01@SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY,
		FACT_SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE = CHANGE_VALUE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactChangeValueSelect
LkpSURVEYVARIABLEOPTION, FactChangeValueSelect lookup(PROJECT_SR_KEY == FACT_PROJECT_SR_KEY
	&& SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY == FACT_SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY
	&& RESPONSE_TYPE == 'DATA INPUT',
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCHANGEVALUE
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY as integer,
		SURVEY_INTERVIEWEE_RESPONSE as integer,
		CHANGE_VALUE as integer,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_DATE_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SR_KEY,
		SURVEY_VARIABLE_SELECTED_OPTION_SR_KEY,
		CHANGE_VALUE,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FACTENTITYSURVEY
